臻享大牌板块下的品牌档期；\n以上板块如出现售价高于专区折扣入口利益点\/品牌外露利益点的商品，则是因为商品的价格变化，会导致的品牌档期外露展示\/商品池更新的折扣计算有一定时间延迟，最终以商品详情页展示的折扣信息为准。\n4、如发现恶意刷取等以不正当手段规避唯品会管理规则、或存在涉嫌欺诈、商业牟利、不恰当或不诚实地使用服务或者其他违反唯品会规则、本活动规则和\/或其他公开规则的行为，唯品会有权终止其参与活动资格；\n5、如出现不可抗力或情势变更情形（包括但不限于重大自然灾害、活动受政府机关指令影响需要停止举办或调整的、活动遭受严重网络攻击或因系统故障需要暂停举办的），则唯品会有权根据相关法律法规的规定主张免责；\n6、如用户曾以不正常手段（包括但不限于作弊、虚假交易、搞乱系统、恶意套取、实施网络攻击等）购买过唯品会商品、领取过唯品会优惠券或参与过唯品会活动，唯品会有权终止其参与本活动的资格，并保留追究其法律责任的权利；\n7、请您在认真阅读并清楚理解相关活动。","wideType":"wide"},"style":[],"data":[]},"general":{"rotate":0,"abTest":{"abt":false,"abtIdType":1,"abtId":"","abtValues":[]},"groupType":0,"show_platform":[],"componentId":2360954,"dataIntegrity":true,"bgImage":"","groupSelectType":1,"enabled":true,"usp_group_scene":1,"mars_name":"活动规则-唯品奥莱","bgColor":"","usp_real_group":[],"elementId":"ah3zb","margin":{"top":0,"bottom":0},"user_group":[],"user_group_block":[],"timing":[],"disabled_platform":[],"showTime":[],"usp_real_group_user_brand_sn":"","showMoreOptions":false,"size":{"width":375,"height":592},"anchor":"","name":"活动规则1","bgOpacity":1,"position":{"top":-1,"left":-1,"z":0},"usp_offline_group":[]}},"id":2360954,"name":"活动规则1","order":37,"parent_id":0,"platform":1,"snapshot_id":0,"style_id":118,"type":0}],"front_comps":[]},"encrypt_id":"w9JtDnhFyzleH6UOuvpdFw","end_time":"2024-07-31 <script>
  (function() {
    var useRetry = '1';
    var isTryRetry = false, hasRetry = location.href.indexOf('&use_backup_static=1') >= 0;
    function report(type) {
      var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest;
      xhr.open("GET","//stat.vipstatic.com/h5front/report?error_business=nova&error_type=pageRetry"+ ("&u=" + encodeURIComponent(location.href)) + ("&type=" + type), true);
      xhr.send();
    }
    function retry() {
      if (isTryRetry || useRetry !== '1') { return }
      isTryRetry = true
      if (location.href.indexOf('&use_backup_static=1') < 0 && useRetry === '1') {
        location.replace(location.href.replace('&m=webview', '').replace('?m=webview', '?') + '&use_backup_static=1');
      } else {
        report('fail');
      }
    }
    if (hasRetry) { report('all'); }
    var libLoadedTimeout = setTimeout(function() {
      retry()
    }, 10000);
    window.libErrorHandler = function(tag) {
      novaStaticSourceHandle.handleError(tag);
      retry()
    }
    var state = 0
    window.libLoadedHandler = function(tag) {
      novaStaticSourceHandle.handleLoad(tag);
      state++;
      if (state >= 3) {
        clearTimeout(libLoadedTimeout);
      }

      // 优化代理lib的时候，文件名和全局变量名不一致会走重试
      var matchs = tag.src.match(/(manifest|index_vue|vendor_vue).*\.js/) || []

      if (window[matchs[1]] !== 1) {
        retry()
      }
    }
  })()
</script>
